ingredients.item: 280g pack Waitrose 2 boneless Scottish Salmon Fillets, skinned and cut into chunks
½ x 25g pack fresh parsley, chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the chorizo and pepper for 2-3 minutes, stir in the tomatoes and olives. Half fill the can with water and add to the pan. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in the salmon and cook for a further 5 minutes. Serve sprinkled with parsley.
